Busted Shin

Crit Effect: Until healed, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and takes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -10-foot status penalty to your land Speed]{-10-foot status penalty to your land Speed}.

Perfect strike

Triple damage.

Sapping Slash

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued}.

Light Blast

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} until the end of its next turn.
